CustomField.description: This field can be used to indicate if the field is on a page layout, or used behind-the-scenes in code; helps drive assessment on whether to keep the field or not.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field can be used to indicate if the field is on a page layout, or used behind-the-scenes in code; helps drive assessment on whether to keep the field or not.
CustomField.label: Field is Visible to User?
